Ice::

She sat down in one of the lab chairs in her "bot mode".
She had a strange idea. She knew she could read and project thoughts. 
But she wondered if she could do anything else.  She looked around 
the lab for a small object. The clipboard near Veratis would work. 
She closed her eyes and saw the clipboard in her mind. Then she 
openend her eyes and stared at the clipboard. She concentrated with 
all her strength. She tried to move the clipboard.  But it didn't 
move. She tried again. It still didn't move. She sighed and wondered 
if she was trying to pick up something too heavy. She looked at a 
sheet of paper on the console. She closed her eyes and envisioned the 
paper in her mind. Then she opened her eyes and looked at the paper.  
She focused her mind and envisioned an invisible hand, reaching out 
from her mind and grabbing the paper. Then she envisioned the paper 
being lifted up off the console. The paper giggled a little, then 
lifted off the console an inch. She smiled, but in doing so, it broke 
her concentratin and the paper fell down onto the console, then slid 
off and onto the floor. "Oh darn, almost had it too." she said loud, 
not worrying if Veratis heard her or not.
